const servicesData = [{
  name: "Balance-Biking-Days",
  img: "https://static.wixstatic.com/media/0583da_eab05d723e4a48d895ce92d3d95ee0a3~mv2.jpg/v1/crop/x_7,y_24,w_710,h_694/fill/w_598,h_576,al_c,q_80,usm_0.66_1.00_0.01/77fb10c75a797b3b8b6b37501e3ee3d5--striders-motocross.webp",
  title: "Balance Biking Days",
  description: "A fun way to help early years children develop coordination, concentration and balance skills",
  btnText: "Find out more",
  featured: true,
  flyer: 'https://ea67bc9c-a6b0-438e-82a8-d0e4df398e62.filesusr.com/ugd/0583da_a3b1dea0c29e470da142af10dfe8c522.pdf'
}, {
  name: "KS1-Taster-Days",
  img: "https://static.wixstatic.com/media/0583da_2a23f2f85f5a47a299fc9f9a689e3e26~mv2.png/v1/crop/x_76,y_1,w_294,h_282/fill/w_412,h_389,al_c,lg_1,q_85/Untitled12.webp",
  title: "KS1 Taster Days",
  description: "Fun interactive sessions for KS1 to stimulate interest, develop confidence and gain new skills through games and challenges.",
  btnText: "Find out more",
  featured: false,
  flyer: ''
}, {
  name: "KS2-Taster-Days",
  img: "https://static.wixstatic.com/media/0583da_de3a829e6ebf4b0d898df710ded5ad81~mv2_d_3264_2448_s_4_2.jpg/v1/crop/x_1842,y_252,w_1422,h_1372/fill/w_614,h_576,al_c,q_80,usm_0.66_1.00_0.01/0583da_de3a829e6ebf4b0d898df710ded5ad81~mv2_d_3264_2448_s_4_2.webp",
  title: "KS2 Taster Days",
  description: "A great way to encourage children to cycle more and sample cycle racing in a safe, controlled environment.",
  btnText: "Find out more",
  featured: false
}, {
  name: "Staff-Training-CPD",
  img: "https://static.wixstatic.com/media/11062b_21b1d0912b4749d2bafc19d001719e66~mv2.jpeg/v1/crop/x_1517,y_39,w_5713,h_5713/fill/w_576,h_576,al_c,q_80,usm_0.66_1.00_0.01/Work%20Presentation.webp",
  title: "Staff Training (CPD)",
  description: "Our CPD workshops are designed to support teachers and other staff who want to run their own sessions and programs in their school. We provide one-day courses for EYFS, KS1 and KS2.",
  btnText: "Find out more",
  featured: true
}, {
  name: "Whole-School-Days",
  img: "https://static.wixstatic.com/media/0583da_ff93cf3464ad4b718fea7aeb8d8e87bc~mv2.jpg/v1/crop/x_91,y_0,w_446,h_446/fill/w_533,h_535,al_c,lg_1,q_80/2794591382.webp",
  title: "Whole School Days",
  description: "Ideal for smaller schools, our Whole School Program ensures every child gets to take part in all inclusive, age related fun session",
  btnText: "Find out more",
  featured: false
}, {
  name: "Learn-to-Ride-Program",
  img: "https://static.wixstatic.com/media/0583da_8e33945dfdca4f81852fa6949ee477a1~mv2.jpg/v1/crop/x_30,y_0,w_218,h_209/fill/w_301,h_293,al_c,lg_1,q_80/278_209__1_IMG_48241.webp",
  title: "Learn-to-Ride Program",
  description: "Our Learn to ride program, Freewheelers is designed to teach kids to ride a bike in 10 weeks using special convertible bikes. The course can be delivered by one of our instructors or by your own staff after training.",
  btnText: "Find out more",
  featured: false
}, {
  name: "After-School-Clubs",
  img: "https://static.wixstatic.com/media/0583da_d84b1d629b3f47ed9332b7fa62fc52f7.jpg/v1/crop/x_436,y_0,w_2392,h_2448/fill/w_612,h_596,al_c,q_85,usm_0.66_1.00_0.01/Whingate%20Armley_0775_JPG.webp",
  title: "After-School Clubs",
  description: "Our clubs are not only great for those who want to fuel their interest and develop new skills, but also for those who just want to hang out on their bikes with friends.",
  btnText: "Find out more",
  featured: false
}, {
  name: "Competition-Days",
  img: "https://static.wixstatic.com/media/0583da_70ac16b227e241e494562d64f806b70d.jpg/v1/crop/x_72,y_4,w_569,h_547/fill/w_602,h_576,al_c,lg_1,q_80/SAMPLED_2294512_740_600___.webp",
  title: "Competition Days",
  description: "We provide everything from a School-based KS2 Competition with race training prior to competition, to fully organised Trust-wide or regional inter-school competitions and -tournaments.",
  btnText: "Find out more",
  featured: false
}, {
  name: "Road-Safety-Training",
  img: "https://static.wixstatic.com/media/0583da_42dd4d30d252402c818d43c70c5896fa.jpg/v1/crop/x_56,y_0,w_249,h_239/fill/w_349,h_326,al_c,lg_1,q_80/20141020_join_us_cycle_training_hr_14138.webp",
  title: "Road Safety Training",
  description: "Our Road Safety program covers basic traffic awareness and road safety for children in years 5 and 6. The 2-day course is part on-site and part on local roads and delivered by qualified Bikeability instructors.",
  btnText: "Find out more",
  featured: false
}];
export default servicesData;

sourcesContent:
const servicesData = [
    {
        name: "Balance-Biking-Days",
        img: "https://static.wixstatic.com/media/0583da_eab05d723e4a48d895ce92d3d95ee0a3~mv2.jpg/v1/crop/x_7,y_24,w_710,h_694/fill/w_598,h_576,al_c,q_80,usm_0.66_1.00_0.01/77fb10c75a797b3b8b6b37501e3ee3d5--striders-motocross.webp", 
        title: "Balance Biking Days",
        description: "A fun way to help early years children develop coordination, concentration and balance skills",
        btnText: "Find out more",
        featured: true,
        flyer: 'https://ea67bc9c-a6b0-438e-82a8-d0e4df398e62.filesusr.com/ugd/0583da_a3b1dea0c29e470da142af10dfe8c522.pdf'
    },
    {
        name: "KS1-Taster-Days",
        img: "https://static.wixstatic.com/media/0583da_2a23f2f85f5a47a299fc9f9a689e3e26~mv2.png/v1/crop/x_76,y_1,w_294,h_282/fill/w_412,h_389,al_c,lg_1,q_85/Untitled12.webp",
        title: "KS1 Taster Days",
        description: "Fun interactive sessions for KS1 to stimulate interest, develop confidence and gain new skills through games and challenges.",
        btnText: "Find out more",
        featured: false,
        flyer: ''
    },
    {
        name: "KS2-Taster-Days",
        img: "https://static.wixstatic.com/media/0583da_de3a829e6ebf4b0d898df710ded5ad81~mv2_d_3264_2448_s_4_2.jpg/v1/crop/x_1842,y_252,w_1422,h_1372/fill/w_614,h_576,al_c,q_80,usm_0.66_1.00_0.01/0583da_de3a829e6ebf4b0d898df710ded5ad81~mv2_d_3264_2448_s_4_2.webp",
        title: "KS2 Taster Days", 
        description: "A great way to encourage children to cycle more and sample cycle racing in a safe, controlled environment.",
        btnText: "Find out more",
        featured: false
    },
    {
        name: "Staff-Training-CPD",
        img: "https://static.wixstatic.com/media/11062b_21b1d0912b4749d2bafc19d001719e66~mv2.jpeg/v1/crop/x_1517,y_39,w_5713,h_5713/fill/w_576,h_576,al_c,q_80,usm_0.66_1.00_0.01/Work%20Presentation.webp",
        title: "Staff Training (CPD)",
        description: "Our CPD workshops are designed to support teachers and other staff who want to run their own sessions and programs in their school. We provide one-day courses for EYFS, KS1 and KS2.",
        btnText: "Find out more",
        featured: true
    },
    {
        name: "Whole-School-Days",
        img: "https://static.wixstatic.com/media/0583da_ff93cf3464ad4b718fea7aeb8d8e87bc~mv2.jpg/v1/crop/x_91,y_0,w_446,h_446/fill/w_533,h_535,al_c,lg_1,q_80/2794591382.webp",
        title: "Whole School Days",
        description: "Ideal for smaller schools, our Whole School Program ensures every child gets to take part in all inclusive, age related fun session",
        btnText: "Find out more",
        featured: false
    },
    {
        name: "Learn-to-Ride-Program",
        img: "https://static.wixstatic.com/media/0583da_8e33945dfdca4f81852fa6949ee477a1~mv2.jpg/v1/crop/x_30,y_0,w_218,h_209/fill/w_301,h_293,al_c,lg_1,q_80/278_209__1_IMG_48241.webp",
        title: "Learn-to-Ride Program",
        description: "Our Learn to ride program, Freewheelers is designed to teach kids to ride a bike in 10 weeks using special convertible bikes. The course can be delivered by one of our instructors or by your own staff after training.",
        btnText: "Find out more",
        featured: false
    },
    {
        name: "After-School-Clubs",
        img: "https://static.wixstatic.com/media/0583da_d84b1d629b3f47ed9332b7fa62fc52f7.jpg/v1/crop/x_436,y_0,w_2392,h_2448/fill/w_612,h_596,al_c,q_85,usm_0.66_1.00_0.01/Whingate%20Armley_0775_JPG.webp",
        title: "After-School Clubs",
        description: "Our clubs are not only great for those who want to fuel their interest and develop new skills, but also for those who just want to hang out on their bikes with friends.",
        btnText: "Find out more",
        featured: false
    },
    {
        name: "Competition-Days",
        img: "https://static.wixstatic.com/media/0583da_70ac16b227e241e494562d64f806b70d.jpg/v1/crop/x_72,y_4,w_569,h_547/fill/w_602,h_576,al_c,lg_1,q_80/SAMPLED_2294512_740_600___.webp",
        title: "Competition Days",
        description: "We provide everything from a School-based KS2 Competition with race training prior to competition, to fully organised Trust-wide or regional inter-school competitions and -tournaments.",
        btnText: "Find out more",
        featured: false
    },
    {
        name: "Road-Safety-Training",
        img: "https://static.wixstatic.com/media/0583da_42dd4d30d252402c818d43c70c5896fa.jpg/v1/crop/x_56,y_0,w_249,h_239/fill/w_349,h_326,al_c,lg_1,q_80/20141020_join_us_cycle_training_hr_14138.webp",
        title: "Road Safety Training",
        description: "Our Road Safety program covers basic traffic awareness and road safety for children in years 5 and 6. The 2-day course is part on-site and part on local roads and delivered by qualified Bikeability instructors.",
        btnText: "Find out more",
        featured: false
    }
]

export default servicesData;
